item.title: Quick emacs+cscope hack for broken symlinks
item.description: I use cscope in emacs as my primary code browsing tool for Linux kernel development. However, I started to get annoyed by cscope errors for broken symlinks. What is happening is that during the Linux kernel build process, a few symlinks get created which are not needed once the kernel is built. I presume that the build tooling doesn't clean up these symlinks after they are removed and that confuses the cscope program.
